item.title: Merz Challenges Germans to Make a Bold Strategic Shift. Will They Do It?
item.description: The likely next chancellor has staked his government on a move to increase military spending. But the window for change is closing fast.

item.title: America Can’t Be Great if America Is Stupid
item.description: Trump’s attack on higher education and scientific research undermines some of our most competitive advantages.
